title: France panorama. [No. 72/52]
creator_credit: Pathé Frères and Societe d'informations Cinematographiques
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Christmas: The first snows of winter; In the silence of a monastery. 2. 150th anniversary of Champollion’s discovery - the new Egyptian antiquities rooms at the Louvre. 3. Bel canto: Regine Crespin - singer extraordinary. 4. Claude Monet - new works for the Marmottan Museum. 5. The nativities of Georges de la Tour - Christmas, and the works of Georges de la Tour.
